properties.name: custom.system.sun.position.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial position of the Sun.

properties.name: custom.system.sun.position.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial position of the Sun.

properties.name: custom.system.sun.velocity.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial velocity of the Sun.

properties.name: custom.system.sun.velocity.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial velocity of the Sun.

properties.name: custom.system.earth.position.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial position of the Earth.

properties.name: custom.system.earth.position.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial position of the Earth.

properties.name: custom.system.earth.velocity.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial velocity of the Earth.

properties.name: custom.system.earth.velocity.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial velocity of the Earth.

properties.name: custom.system.jupiter.position.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial position of Jupiter.

properties.name: custom.system.jupiter.position.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial position of Jupiter.

properties.name: custom.system.jupiter.velocity.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial velocity of Jupiter.

properties.name: custom.system.jupiter.velocity.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial velocity of Jupiter.

properties.name: custom.system.saturn.position.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial position of Saturn.

properties.name: custom.system.saturn.position.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial position of Saturn.

properties.name: custom.system.saturn.velocity.x
properties.description: The 'x' component of the initial velocity of Saturn.

properties.name: custom.system.saturn.velocity.y
properties.description: The 'y' component of the initial velocity of Saturn.

properties.name: custom.simulation.time-step
properties.description: The time step (i.e how much time elapses in one simulation step).

properties.name: custom.simulation.years
properties.description: Amount of Saturnian years (i.e amount of time the simulation will last).

properties.name: custom.output.raw
properties.description: The path for the raw file.

properties.name: custom.output.ovito
properties.description: The path for the Ovito file.

properties.name: custom.output.movement
properties.description: The path for the Movement file.
